description: Discover the funding and scalability challenges faced by blockchain projects, and explore the innovative solutions being implemented to drive blockchain adoption, enhance transaction efficiency, and secure financial backing for decentralized applications.
keywords: blockchain, project funding, scalability, ICO, STO, venture capital, DAOs, layer 2 solutions, sharding, Ethereum 2.0, interoperability, regulatory clarity, blockchain adoption
title: Navigating Blockchain Project Funding and Scalability Challenges
